step_feedback.feedback: Good job clasping your hands. Try to keep your wrists a bit straighter in future repetitions.
You're doing well raising your hands. Focus on keeping your elbows closer to your head as you move them up.
Excellent work spreading your elbows wide behind your head. Keep your shoulders relaxed.
You held the stretch well. Ensure your elbows remain wide and avoid letting them drop forward.
Nicely done reversing the motion. Try to maintain straighter wrists as you return to the starting position.

exercise_summary: Great job with the Clasp and Spread! You're effectively stretching your shoulders and chest. Remember to keep your wrists straighter and elbows close to your head for maximum benefit.
